author: Staff Reporter
text:
A girl student of a government-aided school was found dead in a well near her school on Saturday.

Hemalatha (15) was a class X student of Devalas Higher Secondary School in Kasam village. She turned up for special classes and disappeared for long time. Students and teachers searched for her and finally found her body in a well near the school premises.
title: Girl found dead in a well near school
